name: CantBeatTheSweet
description:
Escape the Claw in this Candy Themed Endless Runner!
Check out more at https://creativeoverloadgames.wordpress.com

You are in a claw machine where the sweets are living peacefully in a world they called SweetLand. Until one day, a claw came down from above and started grabbing them. This claw demolished many of their homes and many sweets were taken. You must survive for as long as possible without getting caught by the claw.

Game is Android Only

This game was developed as a university team project

Credits:

Brandon Nyman - Lead Developer

Jake Simons - Artist & Programmer

Max Boethius - Artist

Oliver Templeman - Programmer
